import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-no-fillings', templateUrl: './no-fillings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./no-fillings.component.css'] }) export class NoFillingsComponent { }
  • Flex

    This defines the ability for a flex item to shrink if necessary. Negative numbers are invalid.

  • Flex Grow

    This defines the ability for a flex item to shrink if necessary. Negative numbers are invalid.

  • Flex Shrink

    This defines the ability for a flex item to shrink if necessary. Negative numbers are invalid.

  • Flex Basis

    This defines the ability for a flex item to shrink if necessary. Negative numbers are invalid.
